ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] 'Call for Help'
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, it will solve the problem... the group I join will have more considerate and forgiving people in it. I have noticed since the beginning that this
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, it will solve the problem... the group I join will have more
considerate and forgiving people in it. I have noticed since the beginning
that this group is full of stuck-up know-it-alls. Good day and good bye.



Love <3
Shannon

"If you have a candle, the light won't glow any dimmer if I light yours off
of mine" - Steven Tyler of Aerosmith
